goal: Implement the maid_snapshot MCP tool to wrap MAID Runner's snapshot command and expose it via the Model Context Protocol
description: Create the snapshot.py module that implements the maid_snapshot tool. This tool wraps the MAID Runner CLI snapshot command, handles async execution, captures stdout/stderr, parses snapshot results including manifest and test stub paths, and returns structured JSON responses compatible with MCP clients.
